Page: only(when something is still early/just starting/hasn't progressed much yet)
Wish/Desire (A wish/goal/request - something you want to happen)
floor(referring the floor in a building)
place/seat/space/square(Used for physical spaces|open areas and seats)
on it/about it (eg i think about it| i am working on it
approximately/roughly/about(used formally and in written language)
self(to indicate that so is doing smth by themselves)
most(referring a large qty or number) - Most people like ice cream
quite/fairly/rather(to express a moderate degree of intensity or extent) eg quite large
full(used for objects|containers|spaces) - eg The bus is full
full/satisfied(used for people) eg : i am full(from eating)
late and later and too late
die Seite: spät und später und zu spät

Page: the rest / the remainder (what's left over or what remains of something)
